title: Illinois Man Helps Neighbors By Shoveling For Free
teaser: Jacob Gale, 22, of Sterling, Ill., saw people were charging $20 to shovel driveways. On Tuesday, he shoveled 26 driveways for free. Here's hoping he at least got a cup of hot chocolate.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
